statement.p: Explain how to find the dimension of W=\mathrm{span}\ \left\{\left[\begin{array}{r} -2 \\ 0 \\ -2 \\ -4 \\ 3 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 1 \\ -1 \\ -2 \\ 3 \\ 1 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -8 \\ 4 \\ 4 \\ -20 \\ 2 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -2 \\ -4 \\ -4 \\ 2 \\ -1 \end{array}\right]\right\}.
